name: Gems of the Aztecs
description: A dangerous journey into the ruins of an ancient city await our hero. Help him find the treasure in Gems of the Aztecs!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Windows Vista/Windows 7/Windows 8/Windows 10 Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 155 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Above average match 3 game. Nice for killing some time.
